## Visualizing distributions with boxplots


::: {.panel-tabset}

## R

```{r, message=FALSE}
#library(ggplot2)
boxplot <- mpg %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = class,
      y = hwy,
      fill = class
    )
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.3)+
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of hwy per class",
    #subtitle = "",
    x = "Car class",
    y = "hwy",
    #color = ""  #Legend title
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

print(boxplot)

```

```{r, message=FALSE}
#library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
boxplot <- mpg %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = hwy,
      # reorder class-factors by median of hwy descending
      y = fct_reorder(class, hwy, .fun=median, .desc=T),
      fill = class 
    )
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(alpha=0.3) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of hwy per class",
    x = "hwy",
    y = "Car class",
    caption = "Pickups are the coolest"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

print(boxplot)

```

:::
